2012 Mario Cup Winter Series

Another New Year's Eve event in the books for the SSBLA. The return of the curved course was greatly anticipated by those racers left cowering after last year's lightning fast straight course. Despite conflicts for a few regular racers, we fielded 7 participants for this year's event.

Race Details

New Year's Eve 2012 Steamboat Springs, CO 7 racers Straight Course

# of Turns

Length

Speed

Another New Year's Eve event in the books for the SSBLA. The return of the curved course was greatly anticipated by those racers left cowering after last year's lightning fast straight course. Despite conflicts for a few regular racers, we fielded 7 participants for this year's event.

Podium

Meg Elzea Fastest F*n Female (FFF)
Alex Shortle Best Average Lap
Mario Fastest Lap

Soundtrack

New for the 2012 race was the addition of music. 'Eye of the Tiger' was the offical race theme and every racer got to pick a walk-out song. Take a listen!
